column3: $Dave Roberts threw his bat at Bill GreifFILENAME_TX"

$Expos used a 5-man infield; Bob Stinson entered in Jorge Roque's lineup spot, but was positioned at 3B; official totals show him at 3B, but he is correctly playing CF; also Laboy was temporarily positioned at 2B, but the official totals have him with a game at this position, which is not correct1973HOU.EVN.regular.comment.csv"
$Cesar Cedeno broke for HP as Tom Walker wound up; Walker stopped and was called for the game-ending balk1973HOU.EVN.regular.comment.csv"
ej,helmt101,P,froeb901,Call at 2B Tommy Helms ejected by 2B umpire Bruce Froemming when Froemming ruled Mike Lum safe at 2B because Helms did not touch 2B1973HOU.EVN.regular.comment.csv"
ej,fox-c101,M,colon901,Balls and strikes $Giants manager Fox ejected by HP umpire Colosi for arguing balls and strikes sometime in 7th inning1973HOU.EVN.regular.comment.csv"
Bob Robertson left with bad back1973HOU.EVN.regular.comment.csv"
Don Wilson left with blister on finger1973HOU.EVN.regular.comment.csv"
Don Wilson injured trying to stop Mike Tyson's hit with barehand1973HOU.EVN.regular.comment.csv"

ej,durol101,M,kiblj901,Call at 2B $Don Wilson picked off Bobby Tolan at 1B but Tolan ran for 2B; Bob Watson's relay beat Tolan, who ducked under SS ROger Metzger; Metzger tumbled over Tolan for what appeared to be the third out; 2B umpire John Kibler ruled that Metzger did not tag Tolan, who stood up and stood on the bag; Astros Manager Leo Durocher ran onto the field yelling at Kibler; Durocher kicked Tolan's helmet and was ejected by Kibler; Durocher then kicked the helmet again, this time into Kibler's shins; Tolan called it his most embarrasing stolen base1973HOU.EVN.regular.comment.csv"
$The Expos, especially coach Dave Bristol, were upset at a pitch called a ball to Cesar Cedeno1973HOU.EVN.regular.comment.csv"
ej,brisd801,C,steld901,Arguing (Threatened umpire; threw hat) Expos Coach Dave Bristol ejected by 3B umpire Dick Stello1973HOU.EVN.regular.comment.csv"
$both Bill Russell and Dave Lopes ended up on 3B1973HOU.EVN.regular.comment.csv"
Willie Montanez hit off Larry Dierker's wrist into LF1973HOU.EVN.regular.comment.csv"
$Willie Montanez called for interference on grounder1973HOU.EVN.regular.comment.csv"
$Al Oliver ran to 3B when J.R. Richard pitched from windup1973HOU.EVN.regular.comment.csv"
